name: node-lucene
description: apache lucene bindings for nodejs and utilities around node-java to auto generate interfaces and implementations from java .jars
author: Sebastian Gurin

scripts.build: npx yamat run npm run build
scripts.yamat-link: npx yamat link && npx yamat run "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" && npx yamat run "npm i" && npx yamat run "npm run build" && npx yamat run npm test
scripts.yamat-unlink-pack: npx yamat run "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat unlink --version pack && npx yamat run "rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json" && npx yamat run npm i && npx yamat run npm run build && npx yamat run npm run test
scripts.yamat-patch-publish: npx yamat run "npm version patch" && npx yamat unlink && npx yamat --break-on-error no run npm publish
